channel.title: The Community SFoL
channel.description:
So I’ll be doing a Community SFoL. Where people can give their ideas of what they believe should be part of the regular FoL’s. This isn’t just limited to custom roles, you may also do Role Buffs or Nerfs. (Maybe even a new scum faction who knows)
Chosen Blue Dragon Roles: TBA Chosen Unseen Roles: TBA Chosen Cult Roles: TBA Chosen Neutral Roles: TBA
If your interested show an idea you have in this thread by either making it here or sending a link to it from another post. Me and my Balance team will decide if the roles balanced or if he needs improvement, change or scrap yard.
Any role accepted by the Balance team will show above and be added to the Rolelist.
Currently I’m the only member on the balance team but feel free to PM me to ask to join the Community SFoL Balance Team.

item.title: The Community SFoL
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Counterpoint:

Grand Idea FoL - Ashe's Version

The Ultra Super Mega Fool

Neutral Wildcard
Poorest of Fellows (Passive) - If you are lynched 1 random voters turn into fool, 1 random voter is poisoned, 1 random voter loses all abilities, 1 random voter loses the ability to vote, 1 random voter becomes a posessor. Each of these are independent of each other.
Get f0oled (Day) - Target player turns into a fool. Can only target people who have said the word “fool” today, or people called PokemonKidRyan - 2 uses
Hide (Night) - Hide behind target player. All actions targetting you are silently redirectes to your target. - 3 uses
More fool you (Night) - Anyone who visits you tonight is turned into a fool. 2 uses
Be lynched, or have 3 fools lynched in a game

Read full topic

item.title: The Community SFoL
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
This is basically SFoL 00, but with a different name. The problem with that was in my opinion that you can’t just throw more classes at a format and expect it to be better. Especially if these classes are community throwaways that don’t fulfill a specific need.

As for this game individually, it’s going to have no cohesion, if you just take user submitted classes, because typically they don’t take into account other classes already in the setup. They can’t even for any future classes submitted. It’s like making a cop, where all the scum are godfathers.

You’d be better off refining your original ideas, listening to feedback and pitching that instead of just playing “FoL, but now with some of my own classes.” (That probably needs to pass review anyways)

Or you can just make it a fully different SFoL yourself and design more classes or just post them in GI and hope they roll sometime.

Read full topic

item.title: The Community SFoL
item.dc:creator: ChopChop
item.description:
@DatBird @Geyde
Yes there is a Balance team but there isn’t a thread for others to discuss their ideas regarding FoL Custom Roles/Role Changes and so I decided to make one and decided to have people give their ideas and as such I may also add a few of mine who knows.
Once enough roles/changes are added to this thread I’ll start adding a game for this on queue so we can all try this out.
